intent_atoms.description: VR-003 validation path must correctly handle matching, mismatching, truncated, and undersized payload scenarios.
CLI formatting for VR-003 issues should preserve existing console formatter expectations.
Unit tests using BoxValidator must cover matching, mismatching, truncated, and undersized payloads.
Live parse integration tests must confirm catalog-aligned version/flag pairs remain warning-free while mismatches emit VR-003 warnings.
BoxValidator is used directly for focused unit coverage of VR-003 validation path.

functional_units.name: BoxValidator Validation Path
functional_units.description: Validates payloads against catalog metadata, checking for matching, mismatching, truncated, and undersized scenarios

functional_units.name: Live Parse Integration Tests
functional_units.description: Runs integration tests to ensure catalog-aligned version/flag pairs are warning-free while mismatches emit VR-003 warnings through the pipeline

functional_units.name: Console Formatter for VR-003 Issues
functional_units.description: Formats VR-003 validation issues in the CLI output according to existing formatting expectations

functional_units.name: Documentation Archiving
functional_units.description: Archives in-progress brief and updates summary files for task tracking

functional_units.name: CLI and UI Issue Logging for Unknown Catalog Entries
functional_units.description: Produces actionable info-level issues when unknown catalog entries are encountered across CLI and UI pipelines (planned for VR-006)
